title: Legal & Imprint · Explosion · Developer tools and consulting for AI, Machine Learning and NLP
body: ExplosionAI GmbH Matthew Honnibal, Ines Montani Amtsgericht Berlin-Charlottenburg HRB 181081 B DE309128901 ExplosionAI GmbH, Skalitzer Str. 100, 10997 Berlin, Germany Matthew Honnibal, Ines Montani contact@explosion.ai We constantly check and update the information on these web pages. Despite the utmost care taken, we cannot rule out that some of the data may since have become outdated. Therefore, we cannot accept liability for the currency, accuracy and completeness of the information displayed. The same applies to all other web pages that can be reached via hyperlink. ExplosionAI GmbH is not responsible for the content of websites which can be reached via such links. Furthermore, we reserve the right to make changes or additions to the information displayed. Content and structure of the ExplosionAI GmbH website is protected by copyright. The reproduction of information or data, in particular the use of texts, text excerpts or illustrative material, requires our prior approval. Explosion is a software company specializing in developer tools and tailored solutions for AI and Natural Language Processing. We’re the makers of spaCy, one of the leading open-source libraries for advanced NLP.
